summary: An ordinance relating to the Police and Fire Departments; modifying the conditions of employment therein by requiring certain members (Classes "C" and "D") to lay off a total of fifteen days without pay during the period of January 1, 1937 to January 1, 1938 in order to reduce expenses and conform to the 1937 budgets of said departments; and suspending all ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
